mapper.insert: insert into rect(rect_no, makr_nm, model_nm, instl_lc, instl_de, pero, x_crdnt, y_crdnt) values(#{rect_no}, #{makr_nm}, #{model_nm}, #{instl_lc}, #{instl_de}, #{pero}, #{x_crdnt}, #{y_crdnt})
mapper.update: update rect set instl_lc = #{instl_lc}, x_crdnt = #{x_crdnt} where rect_no = #{rect_no}
